Cross-campus Enrollment

The Cross-campus Enrollment system allows Berkeley students to take online courses offered by other schools in the University of California with no additional tuition fees. These courses are developed and taught by UC faculty and instructors and will earn UC unit credit, with the potential for GE, pre-major or major credit based on departmental and programmatic requirements.
